channel.title: An error
channel.description:
So on my server when I kill someone I the person I kill get's dc'd and in my cmd I get this error,
[code][11/25/10 2:43 PM]: java.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero [11/25/10 2:43 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerAssistant.applyDead(Player Assistant.java:1031) [11/25/10 2:43 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:620) [11/25/10 2:43 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:178) [11/25/10 2:43 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:138) [/code]

item.title: An error
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51

l2code and stop being such a stupid noob <3
